law.text: The purpose of KRS 211.130 to 211.160 is to provide for the acceptance, custody, and use, by the Commonwealth of Kentucky, of funds and properties that may be given, granted, contributed, donated, bequeathed, devised, and conveyed for the hospitalization, training, education, and care of individuals with severe physical disabilities, including grants that may be made for said purposes by the government of the United States of America.
law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 405, sec. 73, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 165, sec. 2, effective June 19, 1952.
